titleStmt.title: A dialogue agaynst the tyrannye of the Papistes. Translated out of Latin into Englysse, by E.C.
Dialogus contra papistarum tyrannidem. English.
titleStmt.author: Haddon, Walter, 1516-1572, attributed name.
Seres, William, d. ca. 1579.
E. C., fl. 1562.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Dialogus contra papistarum tyrannidem.
Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Includes "A prayer" by W.S., i.e. William Seres.
Variant: title page does not have translator's initials.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
